universal.speaker: narrator
universal.text: The Stellar Concord vessel Dawnseeker detected an anomalous signal from the dead world Vharos.

universal.speaker: narrator
universal.text: When the crew investigated, a cosmic pulse tore the ship apart.

universal.speaker: narrator
universal.text: You awaken in the wreckage, alone, surrounded by rust and ruin.

universal.speaker: narrator
universal.text: The signal still pulses in your mind. Drawing you deeper into the wastes.

universal.speaker: narrator
universal.text: Something ancient stirs beneath the surface of this dying world.

universal.speaker: narrator
universal.text: The void remembers. And now, it remembers you.

korvax.speaker: narrator
korvax.text: Warning klaxons. Failing systems. The familiar nightmare of malfunction.

korvax.speaker: korvax
korvax.text: Thermal regulator critical. Core temperature exceeding safe parameters.

korvax.speaker: narrator
korvax.text: Your cybernetic systems spark and stutter. Something in the crash broke you further.

korvax.speaker: narrator
korvax.text: But broken things can still fight. Broken things can still survive.

korvax.speaker: korvax
korvax.text: Systems... online. Barely. Time to move.

korvax.speaker: narrator
korvax.text: The Ironspine Wastes stretch before you. Rust and ruin as far as the eye can see.

lyria.speaker: narrator
lyria.text: Time fractures around you. Past and future blur into a single screaming moment.

lyria.speaker: lyria
lyria.text: I've seen this before. Or will I see it? The timelines are... wrong.

lyria.speaker: narrator
lyria.text: Your temporal abilities, once controlled, now surge beyond your grasp.

lyria.speaker: narrator
lyria.text: Vharos amplifies what you are. And what you are terrifies you.

lyria.speaker: lyria
lyria.text: Focus. One timeline at a time. Start with survival.

lyria.speaker: narrator
lyria.text: The Eclipse Marsh shimmers with impossible reflections. Your journey begins.

auren.speaker: narrator
auren.text: Light. Burning, purifying light. The symbol of everything you abandoned.

auren.speaker: auren
auren.text: The Order's mark still burns on my soul. Even here. Even now.

auren.speaker: narrator
auren.text: You left the First Light behind. But faith isn't so easily shed.

auren.speaker: narrator
auren.text: Vharos tests all beliefs. Especially the ones we try to bury.

auren.speaker: auren
auren.text: I am no longer a paladin. But I can still protect. I can still atone.

auren.speaker: narrator
auren.text: The Radiant Highlands glow on the horizon. Calling you home.

shade.speaker: narrator
shade.text: Who are you? The question echoes through fractured memories.

shade.speaker: shade
shade.text: Another mask. Another mission. But this time... something's different.

shade.speaker: narrator
shade.text: Faces flicker through your mind. Identities worn and discarded.

shade.speaker: narrator
shade.text: The crash triggered something. Memories that shouldn't exist. Faces that might be yours.

shade.speaker: shade
shade.text: The Syndicate wanted me here. But why? What did they know?

shade.speaker: narrator
shade.text: The Obsidian Thicket whispers secrets. Some of them might even be true.

universal.speaker: narrator
universal.text: The deeper you travel, the more Vharos reveals its true nature.

universal.speaker: narrator
universal.text: The Seals that bind Xal'Korath grow weaker. You can feel it in your bones.

universal.speaker: narrator
universal.text: Corruption spreads. Factions grow desperate. And something watches from the void.

universal.speaker: narrator
universal.text: The Cradle Abyss. Where reality collapses and all paths converge.

universal.speaker: narrator
universal.text: Xal'Korath stirs in its prison. The World-Eater senses your approach.

universal.speaker: narrator
universal.text: Every choice has led to this moment. The Pattern waits to be written.
